subtitle: as far as land animals go pork is
generally not the best for us to consume
spiritually speaking pigs are designed
by nature to clean up garbage they eat
the leftovers and the scraps that we
don't want and God designed them for
this purpose to help create manure to
help nourish our plants and trees the
hog farming system is one of the
filthiest system of all of our land farm
operations and when we eat pigs we are
taking that pollution and contamination
into our bodies there have also been
people who trying the carnivore diet
found that certain attributes of their
blood work got a lot worse when they had
a lot of pork products but when they
took it out their blood became normal
even biblically it was written that God
forbid people not to eat pigs because
they were unclean to us this wasn't an
accident or some arbitrary rule bottom
line we'll be happier and healthier
without it and if we stop buying it the
Food Industries will be forced to change
and evolve and so if you're eating meat
I'd recommend sticking with chicken and
beef
